original_text: And he will appoint him captains over thousands, and captains over fifties; and will set them to ear his ground, and to reap his harvest, and to make his instruments of war, and instruments of his chariots.
korean_text: 그가 또 너희의 아들들을 천부장과 오십부장을 삼을 것이며 자기 밭을 갈게 하고 자기 추수를 하게 할 것이며 자기 무기와 병거의 장비도 만들게 할 것이며

sentences.original_text: And he will appoint him captains over thousands
and will set them to ear his ground
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들을 자기 땅을 갈게 할 것이며

sentences.original_text: and to make his instruments of war
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그의 전쟁 무기를 만들게 하며
그의 전차 기구들을 만들게 할 것입니다
